name: Vital Hydra Solutionu2122 PRO Glow Face Mask with Hyaluronic Acid
about: What it is:u00a0An intensive face mask, suitable for use after laser treatments, that boosts hydration by 108 percent with hyaluronic acidu2014for visibly healthy, glowing skin...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness..Formulation: Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid and Pentavitinu2122: Deliver intense hydration...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, and sulfates SLS & SLES...What Else You Need to Know: This upgraded mask packs a punch with powerful ingredients concentrated in a water-gel sheet. Its innovative delivery system encapsulates hyaluronic acid for seamless absorption into skin, providing all-day hydration that visibly improves fine, dry lines...This product is dermatologist tested and suitable for sensitive skin...Clinical Results:.Clinical results after one use:.+ Immediately improves hydration levels by 108%*.+ Immediately strengthens the skinu2019s barrier by 45%*..*Clinical testing on 32 females after 1 use. Effect varies by individual...**Shown to be safe for use following Intense Pulsed Light (IPL) treatment inu202f1u202fweek clinical usage test....Sensory results after one use:.+ 91% agree skin feels deeply hydrated*..*Consumer testing conducted on 102 women after using the product one time..
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid and Pentavitinu2122: Deliver intense hydration...Water/Aqua/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Glyceryl Glucoside, Glycerin, Trehalose, Betaine, Erythritol, Saccharide Isomerate, Allantoin, Methyl Trimethicone, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ethylhexylglycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Tromethamine, Dipropylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Glyceryl Stearate, Citric Acid, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Citrate, Hydroxyacetophenone.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Unfold face mask and gently apply to clean skin..-Leave on for 15 to 20 minutes..-Remove mask and massage excess product into skin..-Use two to three times a week or when dry skin needs an extra-hydrating boost..-Suitable for use after cosmetic laser treatments..-Follow with Cicapairu2122 Sensitive Skin Moisturizer (sold separately).

reviews.review_title: The best sheet mask to exist
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Dr. Jart for 3 years now, and have been obsessed with these productsu2026 this new pro hydrating and plumping mask is one step higher than the vital hydra one that I usually useu2026 got it in the pack with the water cream (also crazy good)u2026. Cannot recommend more. Dr.jart is changing the game with affordable skincare and I canu2019t get enough!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this. My skin felt hydrated and soft.

reviews.review_title: My Neutrogena Hydroboost mask has competition!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a solid mask! I used the mask at night and I woke up with my skin still feeling hydrated. I love that itu2019s fragrance free too! The only reason Iu2019m giving it 4 stars is because of the price, which is a little high (to me) for a single use product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gave me a reaction around my eyes sadly. Had to wash off immediately after putting it on and I never have reactions to anything and have used this brand lots of times

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this mask, my skin has a healthy glow. It truly gives me a makeup optional look. I feel beautiful!

reviews.review_title: Love how this product made my skin look!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This made my skin so glowy and soft it's great to use before you have an important day that you need to look good on because your skin will look amazing.
